item.title: Quote! your first post!
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:68, topic:137397”][quote author=pko link=topic=188962.msg1711560#msg1711560 date=1188372061]

When i Touch myself I use a bagel, and dream of bathing in pepto bismal while paul clips my toenails and i shave his head.

may not be my first post, your pick
[/quote][quote author=pko link=topic=3624.msg93940#msg93940 date=1153984556]
I used the lookin on other people test… but i accidentally wrote her name instead of mine, fuck damnit!

Also… I am already getting into a college (usf ftw omg) so i sckrewed around on the pre something exam… i put the answers in my pants (you know where…) so when i needed an answer, i reach down, grab it, and look. the teacher STARED at me for that whole 2 hours… but i dont know if it was a good or bad look… =\

Also… I think in the 6th grade, My stupidass geography teacher used to give us 1-3 days to learn a whole country. But she was such a stupidass not to take down maps of the USA and countries of the walls… so i just looked at the wall… and manged A’s (H)
[/quote]that looks like a lie tbh[/quote]

tbh, it is.

but a counter-tbh, I actual remember another one of these threads and posting a completely different post… It was a moparscape post… did they take those out?

Read full topic

item.title: Quote! your first post!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

RXVL:

My first post was about an hour after the moparscape/moparisthebest split, and all the links in the tutorial list on moparscape were mopristhebest, so they didnt work, and I demanded that they fixed the links xD.

Wrong!

[quote=“RXVL, post:1, topic:10684”]when I first try to run moparscape.bat or whatever it is, the bot runs and it goes to the loading thingy, then it says requesting title screen connection error- retrying in 59-1 HELP ME PLZZZ!!! I had this working on one computer but now it wont work… help me!!

And now i get this message on the bot:

[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 12:17:04 AM[/size][hr]come on dont be like that guys…[/quote]

item.title: Quote! your first post!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“teh spede, post:56, topic:137397”][quote author=teh spede link=topic=3281.msg31683#msg31683 date=1147802360]

[code]program Autominer;
var rocksmined,x,y,mine:integer;

const
rock1color=0;

procedure starttomine;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Rock1Color,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth (x,y)
wait(1000+random(2500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(mine,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos (x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+Random(1000))
rocksmined:=rocksmined+1;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
Mine := BitmapFromString(17, 17, ‘z78DADD94DB0A80200C407F69’ +
‘B38BFAA8ADFFFFA5861B44880F6952B60303D9F4A0E000AA22828’ +
‘74573EF18C4B2DB7D65522EF590671C6D1429B458783F831E2DDA’ +
‘A225810601428B45B8545DAA76B00872BE5ADC09CC8C69B1E8FB6’ +
‘4F7D2D5A396628F5826E62F16C3E0F016E9A9B2DC0EB16433A7EE’ +
‘1FBD3CA53F603900F40458C2’);
end;
begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
starttomine;
WriteIn('Mined '+inttostr(rocksmined)+ ‘rocks so far’)
until(false)
end.[/code]This Should mine 28 ores, but there is a problem: Line 34: [Error] (34:1): Unknown identifier ‘WriteIn’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\My test.scar
[/quote]
This was the oldest one i found, but I remember posting in the aryan section asking about the “javac” error :o

EDIT: Oh lol wasn’t I stupid I just had a spelling mistake in that script :P[/quote]

On another topic

I not sure if i should post this here but i get a javac thing and i cant compile and how do i start this script cause it does not show in the list and where do i put the class in the botclasses file?

Good memory.

Read full topic

item.title: Quote! your first post!
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“teh spede, post:1, topic:2929”][code]program Autominer;
var rocksmined,x,y,mine:integer;

const
rock1color=0;

procedure starttomine;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Rock1Color,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth (x,y)
wait(1000+random(2500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(mine,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos (x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+Random(1000))
rocksmined:=rocksmined+1;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
Mine := BitmapFromString(17, 17, ‘z78DADD94DB0A80200C407F69’ +
‘B38BFAA8ADFFFFA5861B44880F6952B60303D9F4A0E000AA22828’ +
‘74573EF18C4B2DB7D65522EF590671C6D1429B458783F831E2DDA’ +
‘A225810601428B45B8545DAA76B00872BE5ADC09CC8C69B1E8FB6’ +
‘4F7D2D5A396628F5826E62F16C3E0F016E9A9B2DC0EB16433A7EE’ +
‘1FBD3CA53F603900F40458C2’);
end;
begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
starttomine;
WriteIn('Mined '+inttostr(rocksmined)+ ‘rocks so far’)
until(false)
end.[/code]This Should mine 28 ores, but there is a problem: Line 34: [Error] (34:1): Unknown identifier ‘WriteIn’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\My test.scar[/quote]
This was the oldest one i found, but I remember posting in the aryan section asking about the “javac” error :o

EDIT: Oh lol wasn’t I stupid I just had a spelling mistake in that script

Read full topic
